attributes.title: iyaz

attributes.review: So right after I downloaded the app to keep in touch with mr. basketball, my laundry machine started to bust... 🟤👄🟤 I honestly cannot understand how such thing happened BUTT this is not all, i tried turning it off and was quick to notice that all of my clothes were orange and smelled like rotten sausages 🤮😖. DO NOT download this guyz it’s just going to cause y’all scoliosis🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: 👁Too much spookiness going on👁

attributes.review: this is a terrible app! i was looking at my hot anime boys photos and then suddenly the app downloaded and my phone crashed! it went to turn it on and the charge was at -69% so i plugged it in and suddenly it said TRUMP2020! i immediately started crying because i just wanted to watch anime and and this app took that away from me ! i had to buy a WHOLE NEW PHONE ! the app is terrible and takes away from my beautiful anime boy time and i would just tell all of you to not get it unless you want your hot anime boys to get glitched out and not be able to see them anymore. -666/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: -666/10 do not recommend

attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP!gave my phone glitches and allll!!!! I downloaded this app to kept track of what the big beluga Oompa Loompa Cheeto puff was up to and next thing u know...weird things started happening to my phone. First it started to over heat and then the “sex offender” shuffle started playing.more traumatizing things occurred but I’m trying to keep this pg and calm.When I deleted the app Karen’s started running to my door and harassing me and I wouldn’t stop receiving text asking me to donate to the Big blue button Oompa Loompa Cheeto puffs campaign.I hate it here.please don’t not buy this app.
attributes.title: “Peace out”

attributes.title: HORRIBLEEEEEEE

attributes.review: i downloaded this app📲 and i said “no❤️”... cuz LISTEN👂🏼!!  i am definitely the type of person👨🏼‍🦲 to have a lot of apps on their phone🤪 and so far it hasn’t been glitchy🌀 thank obama!😅 but as soon as i downloaded this app... it wouldn’t stop... POOPING💩 and by that i mean a bunch of little poop emojis kept sprouting🌱 on my screen whenever i opened🚪this app🤢 i just had to delete 🚫 because MY president would never allow this to happen🙅🏼‍♀️🤮🤡
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG APP🤢👎🏼🤡
